title: Any update on 10 bans? Sick of seeing the same 10 champs every fucking game.

replies.body: When everyone is on the new client, we will get ten bans.
At least mid-season, if not longer.
it's still in beta right now, so still a while.

What do you think will happen when those extra bans come... it's going to be the same situation, just with different champs because the others are banned.


"These guys are banned, so the next op are...."

Eh.. Sort of. 

The same 10 aren't going to be banned all the time, but most of the time they will be... 

Test it for yourself.. Ban Jhin and Varus.. Botlane actually gets some variety, see all the marksmen.

Not really, ban them and you'll more than likely end up with a limited variety of ashe/cait/draven.

At least from what i've seen but that's just personal experience, may very well happen

> Sick of seeing the same 10 champs 

Doesn't this mean that you're contributing to the problem by not picking a different champ?

What are you, in middle school? How is "nerd" an insult anymore? 

It's more a term of endearment now.

> [{quoted}](name=TyrekGoldenspear,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Bv1Kisev,comment-id=00010000000000000000,timestamp=2017-02-24T13:55:59.804+0000)
>
> ... Wouldn't that hurt?

Plot twist:  OP is Negan. Your dick is his dick.
